```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

mis_datos <- readr::read_csv("datos_proyecto.csv")
```

```{r}
mis_datos %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(subconjunto) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(media_x = mean(x), 
            media_y = mean(y),
            dev_est_x = sd(x),
            dev_est_y = sd(y),
            cor_xy = cor(x,y,method = 'pearson'))
```
